alert.note: Alert for Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 2:26PM EST until January 27 at 4:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Cass MI, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to occasionally moderate snow into this evening is expected to continue to hamper travel, especially over unplowed and secondary roads. More localized blowing and drifting is still possible over mainly open and rural areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
